Server language has been set to **{language}**

This will be the default language for:
â€¢ Users who haven't set a personal language
â€¢ Static embeds (music player, etc.)
â€¢ Server-wide messages

languages.priority_text:
**Priority Order:**
1. Your personal language (highest)
2. Server language
3. Default language (English)

**Static embeds** (music player, etc.) always use server language.
languages.tip: Tip: Personal language overrides server language for you!

prefix.priority_explanation:
**Priority Order:**
1. Personal prefix (highest)
2. Server prefix
3. Default prefix
4. Mention: {mention}
prefix.commands_help:
`prefix set <prefix>` - Set your personal prefix
`prefix remove` - Remove your personal prefix
`prefix server <prefix>` - Set server prefix (Admin)
`prefix server reset` - Reset server prefix (Admin)

prefix.server_reset_failed_title: âŒ No Custom Prefix to Reset
prefix.server_reset_failed: âŒ No Custom Prefix to Reset
prefix.personal_prefix_note: Users with personal prefixes will still use their own prefix.
prefix.mention_alternative: You can also use {mention} as a prefix!

reactionrole.help:
**Reaction Roles Commands:**
`!reactionrole add <message_id> <emoji> <role>` - Add a reaction role
`!reactionrole remove <message_id> [emoji]` - Remove reaction role(s)
`!reactionrole list` - List all reaction roles
`!reactionrole create <channel> <title> [description]` - Create a new reaction role message
`!reactionrole update <message_id>` - Update message to show roles
`!reactionrole reload` - Reload from database
`!reactionrole debug [message_id]` - Debug information

add.invalid_message_id: âŒ Invalid message ID. Please provide a valid number.
add.role_too_high: âŒ I cannot assign this role because it's higher than my highest role.
add.message_not_found: âŒ Message not found. Make sure the message ID is correct and in this server.
add.invalid_emoji: âŒ Invalid emoji. Please use a valid emoji.
add.success: âœ… Reaction role added! {emoji} â†’ {role} on message {message_id}

remove.invalid_message_id: âŒ Invalid message ID. Please provide a valid number.
remove.not_found: âŒ No reaction roles found for this message.
remove.success_emoji: âœ… Removed reaction role {emoji} from message {message_id}
remove.success_all: âœ… Removed all reaction roles from message {message_id}

list.empty: âŒ No reaction roles configured in this server.
list.title: ğŸ“‹ Reaction Roles

create.success:
âœ… Reaction role message created in {channel}!
Message ID: `{message_id}`
Use `!reactionrole add {message_id} <emoji> <role>` to add roles.
create.no_permission: âŒ I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.

errors.no_permission: âŒ You need the 'Manage Roles' permission to use this command.

info.title: ğŸ­ Auto-Role Settings

No auto-role is currently set.

New members will not receive any role automatically.

`{prefix}autorole set <role>` - Set auto-role
`{prefix}autorole remove` - Remove auto-role
`{prefix}autorole` - View current settings

set.success_description: New members will automatically receive {role} when they join!
